reviews.review: Muy buena historia y muy buenos puzzles para estar horas quemando neuronas con un amigo
great game if you like portals and puzzles
It's Portal... it's fun... and cake is good

la mayoria del juego no es tan dificil solo requiere de observacion pero va a ver momentos que vas decir estuve 10 minutos pensandolo y provando y la respuesta era simple. en conclusion no siempre va a ser complicado pero primero pensa en lo mas simple

There are freaking portals. But that's not even the best part. The characters. GLaDOS, Wheatly, and Cave Johnson are some of the most lovable and well put-together characters in all of video games. If you haven't played this legend, the game rated as #1 on all of steam, you need to. The steam workshop compatability is really cool too
Amazing game with humour and puzzles that are never hard so that you get stuck but still feels like a challange and makes you feel smart when you solve them. I recommend it to everyone.

Got into this game way too late.  Bought both Portal and Portal 2 together during a sale and have been very satisfied with both purchases.  The puzzles are fun and the story is amusing.  I'm not super into fast paced FPS games so this is a nice fresh breath of air.  Love the voice Cameos in the Portal 2 as well.

Just finished re-playing this game for a second time and man, oh man, OH MAN. I literally can't recommend it enough. The storytelling is amazing, and it's a tremendously good puzzle game. The humor is spot on just like in the first game, if not even better, and I really have to praise the OST as well (both ending songs have been in my playlists since I beat the games the first time and I never get tired of listening to them)

20/10, it's definitely a must play
Portal gun go pew pew. Nice story and well done puzzles. Can’t wait for the upcoming dlc.

I really am enjoying this game. I got it for my birthday, and haven't finished it yet. The only setback from it being in my number one slot of "must play" is the fact that they use some swear words. If you are not ok with hearing any swearing, this game is not for you.
Love this game, even when you finish the main game, there is always co-op and custom levels to play!
Great game. Please get this if you don't.
Идеальная головоломка с юмором (черным) и продуманным сюжетом
the storytelling is hilarious and the gameplay is a lot of fun. I really liked the co-operative mode
GREAT game i have loved it for over many many years and it never fails to amaze me

Excellent puzzle game with lot of challenges. Completely innovative gameplay at its time. Very good environment and thematic. You will want to keep playing and playing to see what happens at the end, and even then you will for sure want to replay it right away.
Excellent price specially on discount.
cried over wheatley twice. 10/10 would recommend

Oyun çok iyi hele bide sınavlarınız varsa IQnuz yükseliyor tam bir bulmaca sevdalısı oyunu ama bazı bölümleri çok kanser benim tavsiyem ilk başka bulmaca oyunu alın örnek olarak sherlock holmes ondan sonra portal 2 alırsınız 3.sünü bekliyoruz.

I like this game a lot

It's tests you brain and gives you an amazing journey that you'll never forget 
Its funny and has the best soundtrack I've ever heard 
I'd recommend you getting :)
Very intriguing game with special twists and puzzles!
юмор некоторый на локализации врезается а так топ
Masterpiece! Amazing sense of humor, complicated puzzles, good plot and other interesting stuff. 10/10

Really fun game for single and coop. Love it.

Portal 2 is a really good game. However the ROBLOX version is superior, therefore, just play the roblox version and not this shitty game that's 10 dollars. Ok stop threatening me I changed my opinion.
Such an immersive and impressive games. The characters are really likeable, bad guy or not. I definitely recommend this!

Portal  serisi sona eriyor. İlk oyundan ziyade hikaye baya uzun. Hatta beni çok baydı son iki bölümü youtube dan bakarak geçtim sırf oyunun sonunu getirmek için. İlk bi bulmacalar yapıyordun eyvallah sonra hikaye akışına göre değişiyor gene eyvallah sonra gene değiyor sonra gene vsvs o biraz yordu ama güzel oyun bundle paketi indirimde uygun alınır.
Özellikle bu oyunun arkadaşlarla oynanabilmesi efsane tavsiye ederim.
Love the game and the Coop is amazing!
best game love this game, play the game if you have another person to do so with.
